column2: "Oh? You achieved the objective with hardly any trouble, did you?"
"What a shame. I was hoping for lots and lots and lots more kills."
"Well, whatever. I don't want to get in trouble for going against the ARKS Code. Rules are rules, after all."
"So, I'll file my report with ARKS HQ. Hurray for you, right? "
"Let this fire you up for further carnage! Become a master at tormenting your foes!"
